Indian Economy.title: Mint Quick Edit | Strong growth, low inflation—but can India steady its export ship?
Indian Economy.summary: India’s economy is showing strong growth amid cooling prices. As the finance ministry’s September update notes, private consumption and investment are looking up. Where today’s global trade storm leaves our export prospects, though, remains a big question.
